title: Mango & Pneapple Cream
description: Our Vegan Mango & Pineapple Cream smells tropical and sweet, enriched with Mango Butter and Vitamin E It is light, creamy and highly moisturising

title: Universal Hair & Body Butter
description: Our Universal Hair & Body Butter is a powerhouse which lives up to its name! This product is formulated with an intentional blend of soft shea butter mixed with organic plant and seed-based oils, hand selected for their contribution to healthy hair and glowing skin.

title: Body Butter Bundle
description: Now you can purchase our popular vegan body butters in a set! Perfect as a gift or a little self care treat for yourself.

title: Cookie Coffee Body Scrub
description: ur natural organic whipped coffee scrub acts as a great exfoliant leaving skin hydrated, soft, and firm.

title: 100% Cotton Netted Body Towel
description: Our 100% cotton netted body towels are the perfect exfoliant when used with one of our vegan soaps__!

title: African Black Soap with Vitamin E Oil
description: African Black Soap is plant based and contains ingredients such as plantain skins, cocoa pods, and shea tree bark. Combined with coconut oil and shea butter to help treat and soothe skin. Ours is infused with Vitamin E Oil for it's extra moisturising and anti aging properties.

title: Plantain & Oat Soap
description: Our beautiful Plantain and Oat soap is great for those with sensitive skin but still need a cleanser that is gentle in its ability to unclog pores. The oats and grounded dried plantain skin act as a gentle exfoliant which can aid in soothing skin and improving skin tone and texture. The high contents of shea butter ensure skin is mositurised and hydrated after use.

title: Coffee & Coconut Soap
description: Our creamy Coffee & Coconut Soap is great for those with oily/combination skin. It works well to cleanse, nourish, and moisturise your face and body!

title: Bestseller Box Set
description:
Now you can purchase our bestsellers in a set! Perfect as a gift or a little self care treat for yourself. The Best Seller Box Set contains:

 

x1 Universal Hair & Body Butter

x1 Mango & Pineapple Cream

x1 African Black Soap with Vitamin E Oil

 

If this is a gift let us know and we'll add a note!___

title: Vegan Lip Balm
description: Our vegan lip balms are packed full of nourishing butters and oils to keep lips hydrated for long periods of time. Available in 3 yummy flavours!
